dc:title: Neighborhood Council In Action
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: The depression era story of helping a poor woman find and move into a new apartment after being evicted by a heartless landlord for failure to pay rent.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 268 1933-09-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
